Posts.EditableText: I have an idea for a text-based game that would be a fan-fiction mash-up of 2 existing universes. I wouldn't be making any money from it. But, I wonder what the rules are for the site itself (textadventures.co.uk). Are we allowed to share works of fan-fiction here on the site, just for kicks? Thanks in advance for your responses, all. I look forward to reading them!
Posts.HTML: I have an idea for a text-based game that would be a fan-fiction mash-up of 2 existing universes. I wouldn't be making any money from it. But, I wonder what the rules are for the site itself (textadventures.co.uk). Are we allowed to share works of fan-fiction here on the site, just for kicks? Thanks in advance for your responses, all. I look forward to reading them!

Posts.EditableText:
The game creators here will probably tell you it is alright to post fan-fiction stories.
But from my perspective, nobody had ever asked the real author, is he alright having his story being fan-fictionized.
